locale.message: Removes TinyMCE from some of the pages.
TinyMCE fields for users with author role

If you allow authors to self register with your journal(s), you should remove the TinyMCE-Editor from all text areas in the submission process. Otherwise, anyone can register with your site and upload images that will be publicly available.
